title: EIP1559 SmartCon Panel | DC Investor, SquishChaos, James Wang
description:
Smart Contract Summit, hosted by Chainlink Labs, is the biggest smart contract event of the year with leading speakers and projects across DeFi, the NFT economy, and the larger blockchain industry.

Check out the other discussions here:
https://www.smartcontractsummit.io/
